metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5244 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The rds_inc_info_copy function in net/rds/recv.c in the Linux kernelthrough 4.6.3 does not initialize a certain structure member, which allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information from kernel stack memoryby reading an RDS message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5244` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-95.142
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-95.142
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-95.142
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-95.142

linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-95.142
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.13.0-95.142
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.13.0-95.142
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

No subscription required
